name: RI_1_1_7_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Disclosure_Event
title: RI.1.1.7.1 Evidence of Record Entry Disclosure Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Disclosure Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Disclosure Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.7.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when Record Entry content is disclosed according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.

statement.label: RI.1.1.7.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization from which Record Entry content is disclosed.

statement.label: RI.1.1.7.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of Record Entry content disclosed.

statement.label: RI.1.1.7.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the user initiating disclosure of Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.7.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application from which Record Entry content is disclosed.

statement.label: RI.1.1.7.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., disclose).

statement.label: RI.1.1.7.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time Record Entry content is disclosed.

statement.label: RI.1.1.7.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where Record Entry content is disclosed.

statement.label: RI.1.1.7.1#09
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture the rationale for disclosing Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.7.1#10
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the data, document or other identifier for Record Entry content disclosed.

statement.label: RI.1.1.7.1#11
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture that this is an occurrence when Record Entry content is known to be disclosed, according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.

statement.label: RI.1.1.7.1#12
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture known and applicable permissions regarding Record Entry content disclosed including confidentiality codes, patient consent authorizations, privacy policy pointers.
